name: GetStockAvailabilityEstimateForProducts
description: Given a set of products this service returns a detailed estimate for each product when it's expected to be available.

properties.name: IncludeReservedOrders
properties.description: If set true the service will also return reserved OrderLines

properties.name: IncludeShopReplenishments
properties.description: If set to true the service will also return purchase OrderLines meant for shops
